qr.qr_login_description: Log in by scanning the QR code from Smart Glasses.
qr.qr_login_how_to_description_1: 1. Run the VIRNECT Remote App on the smart glasses to be used.
qr.qr_login_how_to_description_2: 2. Select [QR Login] on the login screen.
qr.qr_login_how_to_description_3: 3. Display the QR code on the screen. The device logs in automatically when the QR code is scanned.
qr.qr_login_how_to_description_4: *Only for devices that support QR code
